title: [GAMEPLAY] Mastery Emotes Missing
body:
Hi,
so the title explains it all, the mastery emotes are globally missing.
Whats up with that? are they removed permanently and intentionally or is it just a bug?

replies.body:
Hey! 

Just tested this on a live environment, and I was able to use mine. Would you be able to check again to see if this is still occurring?

http://imgur.com/VN9JduI

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u37h4EIH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-11T17:45:19.565+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Just tested this on a live environment, and I was able to use mine. Would you be able to check again to see if this is still occurring?
> 
> http://imgur.com/VN9JduI

They were back but at the start of the patch they were missing, even tried to change keybind.
So the initial patch (there were 2 I think) caused them to not appear for me. 
Now it works.


(Oh god, I wish I could work with the designers of riot games for playtesting, I am extremely sensitive to anything I perceive wrong or right in games.)
It's a known bug and they're working to fix it. There's a red post about it around here somewhere.
